column1: Memorial Mass of Christian Burial will be held at 10:30 a.m. Monday
column3: 2015 at St. Benedict Catholic Church in Decorah with Rev. Phillip Gibbs officiating. Inurnment will be in St. Benedict Catholic Cemetery in Decorah. Visitation will be from 3:00-6:00 p.m. Sunday June 21 at Fjelstul Funeral Home in Decorah and on Monday beginning at 9:30 a.m.
